results.title: Anxiolytic effect of antidiabetic metformin is mediated by AMPK activation in mPFC inhibitory neurons
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@Diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ receiving the antidiabetic drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ have been observed to exhibit a lower prevalence of @<m>DISEASE_Anxiety_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001008 @@@anxiety disorders@@@, yet the precise mechanism behind this phenomenon is unclear.

citations.NLM: Zhang YM, Zong HC, Qi YB, Chang LL, Gao YN, Zhou T, Yin T, Liu M, Pan KJ, Chen WG, Guo HR, Guo F, Peng YM, Wang M, Feng LY, Zang Y, Li Y, Li J. Anxiolytic effect of antidiabetic metformin is mediated by AMPK activation in mPFC inhibitory neurons Mol Psychiatry. 2023 Oct 5;():. PMID: 37798418

results.title: Efficacy and safety of the metformin-mazindol anorectic combination in rat.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Mazindol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008454 @@@Mazindol@@@-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ combination might be useful in @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Anxiety_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001008 @@@anxiety disorders@@@ or @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ risk factors.

citations.NLM: Argüelles-Tello F, Roa-Coria JE, Zúñiga-Romero Á, Huerta-Cruz JC, Quiñonez-Bastidas GN, Flores-Murrieta FJ, Rocha-González HI, Reyes-García JG. Efficacy and safety of the metformin-mazindol anorectic combination in rat. Acta Pharm. 2021 Jun 1;71(2):279-291. PMID: 33151165

results.title: Metformin produces anxiolytic-like effects in rats by facilitating GABAA receptor trafficking to membrane.
results.text_hl: Thus @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has a potential new use in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Anxiety_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001008 @@@anxiety disorders@@@.

citations.NLM: Fan J, Li D, Chen HS, Huang JG, Xu JF, Zhu WW, Chen JG, Wang F. Metformin produces anxiolytic-like effects in rats by facilitating GABAA receptor trafficking to membrane. Br J Pharmacol. 2019 Jan;176(2):297-316. PMID: 30318707

results.title: Prevalence of anxiety disorder in patients with type 2 diabetes: a nationwide population-based study in Taiwan 2000-2010.
results.text_hl: A low prevalence of @<m>DISEASE_Anxiety_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001008 @@@AD@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2D@@@ was associated with residency in urban areas, the comorbidity of @DISEASE_Hemiplegia @DISEASE_MESH:D006429 @@@hemiplegia@@@ or @DISEASE_Paraplegia @DISEASE_MESH:D010264 @@@paraplegia@@@, the usage of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylureas@@@, and rapid-acting @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ injection therapy.

citations.NLM: Tu HP, Lin CH, Hsieh HM, Jiang HJ, Wang PW, Huang CJ. Prevalence of anxiety disorder in patients with type 2 diabetes: a nationwide population-based study in Taiwan 2000-2010. Psychiatr Q. 2017 Mar;88(1):75-91. PMID: 27155828
